changelog.release_notes:
Added Fjalla and Merriweather.
Added more screenshots.
Changed text to show off the fonts better and consume fewer glyphs.
Documented the system fonts that are not included in this project.
Resized custom fonts to fit better on the screen.  This also shrank the glyph images and freed up a little more space.

Fixing labels

Noticia Text was listed as just Noticia.
Phonebook 24 was listed as Phonebook 14.

data.description: Preview how fonts are displayed on the Pebble.  Aimed at developers with the goal of helping them decide if their app should use a built-in font or one of the more popular custom fonts.  Includes monospaced, digital (LCD / 7-segment display), and sans serif families.  Most are clear and readable when sized down to be small or even extremely tiny.  Open source repository on GitHub so you can see how this was done and use the fonts in your own project.
